bibl.title: Dating Nemean 5 and Bacchylides 13: Criteria and Conclusions. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 1. Nemean 5 and Bacchylides 13. - 2. The victory catalogues of N. 5, I. 6, and I. 5. - 3. 'Objective' criteria? - "The most likely scenario remains that N. 5 and B. 13 were both composed for a single victory won in or no more than a few years before 481 BC."
bibl.seg: CAIRNS Douglas, Dating Nemean 5 and Bacchylides 13: Criteria and Conclusions. Avec résumé en anglais.

1. Nemean 5 and Bacchylides 13. - 2. The victory catalogues of N. 5, I. 6, and I. 5. - 3. 'Objective' criteria? - "The most likely scenario remains that N. 5 and B. 13 were both composed for a single victory won in or no more than a few years before 481 BC."
